name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
description:
Uncage Wolverine’s tragic past and discover how the ultimate weapon was
created. Unleash the razor sharp adamantium claws, feral instincts and
mutant regeneration power of the world’s fiercest hero. Visceral combat.
Pure rage. Epic battles. Take on the impossible in your hunt to uncover
the secrets of Weapon X…then exact your revenge.

Featuring 6 uniquely designed Acts that go through the Wolverine
storyline

Uses the Touch Screen to help locate hidden objects in “Feral Mode”
and utilizing Rage mode to swipe enemies down

Unlockable outfits that are only seen on the DS version

Fight against main foes as seen in the movie - such as Sabretooth,
Gambit, and the Blob
